Causal Mediation Analysis

Documentation for package ‘mediation’ version 4.5.0

  • DESCRIPTION file.
  • User guides, package vignettes and other documentation.
  • Code demos. Use demo() to run them.
  • Package NEWS.

Help Pages

mediation-package mediation: Parametric and non parametric mediation analysis.
amelidiate Function for combining outputs from mediations function and calculating quantities of interest. For use with multiple imputation procedures.
boundsdata Example Data for the Design Functions
CEDdata Example Data for the Crossover Encouragement Design

mediate.sed Estimating Average Causal Mediation Effects under the Single Experiment Design
mediate_tsls Two-stage Least Squares Estimation of the Average Causal Mediation Effects
